notesStmt.note: A translation, by James Sandford, of Plutarch's "Amatoria narrationes" and Heliodorus' "Aethiopica", and "The sentences of the Greeke philosophers, translated for the most part out of French.".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
